nodes.text: The BlasTech light repeating blaster was a light repeating blaster produced by BlasTech Industries, and was a smaller version of the T-21 light repeating blaster.

Based on a successful riot gun design used by the Corporate Sector Authority, this weapon was known for its high rate of fire in a small package. Due to the weapon's small size, it could be used as a support weapon, or as a soldier's service weapon. This gave Alliance SpecForces the stopping power and rate of fire of larger and more awkward models of repeating blasters.
